body.name: Mattel Disney Wish Singing Asha of Rosas Fashion Doll & Star Figure, Posable with Removable Outfit, Sings “This Wish” in English
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 32 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 32 mins
features: Relive the musical fun with the Disney's Wish Singing Asha of Rosas fashion doll featuring the song 'This Wish'!
Kids start the magic by raising Asha's hand and join in as Asha sings a 30-second clip in English!
Asha fashion doll wears her signature look with removable dress, waist belt, and shoes, perfect for play or display!
Posability, true-to-movie details, and soft braided hair inspire styling and storytelling fun!
Star figure can also be clipped on Asha's hand.
Highlighting the magic of wishing, Disney's Wish dolls make an inspiring gift for kids to play out their biggest dreams!
Fans can collect their favorite characters to recreate scenes and make up their own storylines and adventures. Each sold separately, subject to availability.
body.description: Inspired by Disney’s Wish, the Singing Asha of Rosas doll captures the magic and heart from the animated musical! Kids can bring the character to life and hear her sing – lift up Asha’s hand to sing along with her song “This Wish”! Star figure can also be clipped on Asha’s hand to travel along for the adventures. Dressed in her removable outfit and shoes, the Asha doll features her signature look with soft braided hair for styling fun. Fans will love recreating the memorable movie moment. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Singing Asha of Rosas doll features her signature removable fashion and braided hair for endless styling fun. Get ready to sing along! Lift Asha's hand to hear her sing a 30-second clip of her song in English! Star can travel along for the magical adventures with Asha -- just clip the adorable figure onto the doll's hand.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good doll/Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My niece loves this doll. Good quality and perfect size. I would recommend this doll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The signing by is great
reviews.reviewText: Asha’s singing is great with this doll. It does take a few movements of the right arm to have the songs come on. The quality of the voice and volume are just right. Not too loud and not too low. Each song is about 10 seconds roughly. My daughter loves it even more seeing the film before I got this for her birthday the next day after we saw the film. Which was also good by the way. Would recommend this doll.
my 6 year old loves this doll especially because it sings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The item is perfect my child was very happy and it works as it should. Fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely doll for any wish fan
reviews.reviewText: This doll is a really nice doll. It looks exactly like the Wish character Asha and is well made.The outfit is removable and she fits in other clothes as well. Arms and legs move and when you move one arm she sings a song from the movie. Naturally, sound quality isn’t top notch but it’s clear enough and easily recognisable.The doll at full price is quite expensive, but good value when it’s on offer.Great gift for any Wish fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my Disney obsessed daughter as it is a doll of the character Asha, from the upcoming Disney movie Wish.It feels pretty well made and I feel like it will be durable.The clothes look nice and can be removed plus you can see a lot of detail on the face etc.The little star figure which is included can be placed into the dolls hand and raising the arm begins a 30 second clip of music.My little girl loves her new doll and I'm sure she will fall in love with this character once she sees the movie.It's pricey for what it is and I'm not sure the dolls is worth the current price, but as it's a new doll, it is understandable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughters were very excited to see this doll, and quickly unwrapped the box. One of them exclaimed that she even had real braids when they finally got in to the box.It frustrates me slightly that these dolls have plastic bit s that stick inside the head. No matter how close I cut them to the hair, the still can be felt through the hair.I was a bit concerned when I moved the arm forward to test the sound whilst it was in the box. The doll only sang for a very short time. However when the doll was removed from the box she made a proper go at singing.The doll is a standard size and fits in well with the girls' other dolls. They haven't investigated changing the clothes yet, but she might be visiting Barbie's swimming pool later.
